pages.title: Liquid Mud
pages.text: Mud. It is wet mud. Not particularly interesting in and of itself. What is practical is the collision of the mud with other liquids, like $(item)Water$() or $(item)Lava$(). This creates $(item)Dirt$() or $(item)Coarse Dirt$(), respectively.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)While a mud bath sounds like wellness, it is not advised.

pages.title: Item Conversion
pages.text: Some items that come into contact with Mud get tanned.$(br)For example, $(item)Rotten Flesh$() will be converted to a tiny piece of $(item)Hide$().
